comment: The restriction ` <. H , Q >. ` of an Eulerian path ` <. F , P >. ` to an initial segment of the path (of length ` N ` ) forms an Eulerian path on the subgraph ` S ` consisting of the edges in the initial segment. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 6-Mar-2021.) Hypothesis revised using the prefix operation. (Revised by AV, 30-Nov-2022.)
